page.title: 12Events and Communications
page.content: Church Fete: Held annually in July in one of the gardens in the village in aid of church funds. Stalls and side- shows all run by the local inhabitants and raise some Â£800 to Â£1000. Fund Raising: Coffee mornings and Bring and Buy Sales have been held in aid of the Village Hall and various charities, and there are a number of house to house collections. Most houses have telephones on the Long Sutton exchange but it is planned to incorporate this into the main Basingstoke exchange in 1986. No Post office in the block, nearest at South Warnborough but one shortly to be re- opened at Upton Grey. Post collections at Weston Patrick 6am and 4pm except Saturday afternoon and Sundays. Postal deliveries about 6.30am and 3pm.
